00033 #include <stdlib.h>
00034 #include <stdio.h>
00035 
00036 
00037 #include "main.h" /* for SYS_CLK */
00038 #include "motor_pwm.h" /* for Motor-values */
00039 #include "monitor.h"
00040 #include "adc.h"
00041 #include "globals.h"
00042 
00043 void monitor()
00044 {
00045                 int i;
00046                 int val;
00047                 char buf[BUFLEN];
00048                 
00049                 
00050                 /* read temperature */
00051                 //read_gyro_temp = 1;
00052                 /* wait for gyro temp to be read */
00053                 //while( read_gyro_temp )
00054                 //      ;
00055                 
00056                 if( gyro1_temp & 0x0800 )
00057                         {
00058                                         gyro1_temp |= 0xF000;
00059                                         gyro1_temp = gyro1_temp-1;
00060                                         gyro1_temp = ~gyro1_temp;
00061                         }
00062                         else
00063                                 gyro1_temp &= 0x0FFF;
00064                 if( gyro2_temp & 0x0800 )
00065                         {
00066                                         gyro2_temp |= 0xF000;
00067                                         gyro2_temp = gyro2_temp-1;
00068                                         gyro2_temp = ~gyro2_temp;
00069                         }
00070                 else
00071                         gyro2_temp &= 0x0FFF;
00072                         
00073                         
00074                 /* clear VT100 screen */
00075                 snprintf(buf,BUFLEN, "%c[2J", 27); 
00076                 uart_puts_P("\n\r\n\r ############################Scooter Controllerboard Debug Monitor##########################\n\r");
00077                 
00078                 /* print gyro temps */
00079                 uart_puts_P("\n\r------- Gyro temperature -------\n\r");
00080                 snprintf(buf, BUFLEN, "Temp: Gyro1 %u\tGyro2 %u\n\r", gyro1_temp, gyro2_temp );
00081                 uart_puts(buf);
00082                 /* printf Gyro1 Ringbuffer */
00083                 
00084                 uart_puts_P("\n\r----------RINGBUFFERS------------\n\r");
00085                 uart_puts_P("Index\tGyro 1\tGyro 2\tAccel.\n\r");
00086                 
00087                 /*
00088                 for(i=0; i<GYRO1_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE; i++)
00089                 {
00090                         if( gyro1_samples[i] & 0x0800 )
00091                         {
00092                                         gyro1_samples[i] |= 0xF000;
00093                                         gyro1_samples[i] = gyro1_samples[i]-1;
00094                                         gyro1_samples[i] = ~gyro1_samples[i];
00095                         }
00096                         else
00097                                 gyro1_samples[i] &= 0x0FFF;
00098                 }
00099                 for(i=0; i<GYRO2_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE; i++)
00100                 {
00101                         if( gyro2_samples[i] & 0x0800 )
00102                         {
00103                                         gyro2_samples[i] |= 0xF000;
00104                                         gyro2_samples[i] = gyro2_samples[i]-1;
00105                                         gyro2_samples[i] = ~gyro2_samples[i];
00106                         }
00107                         else
00108                                 gyro2_samples[i] &= 0x0FFF;
00109                 }
00110                 */
00111                 for(i=0; i< GYRO1_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE; i++)
00112                 {
00113                         snprintf(buf, BUFLEN, "%d\t%d\t%d\t%d\n\r", \
00114                                         i, gyro1_samples[i], gyro2_samples[i], (accl_high_samples[i]-accl_low_samples[i]) );
00115                         uart_puts(buf);
00116                 }
00117                 uart_puts_P("\n\r---------ADC-Channels------------\n\r");
00118                 uart_puts_P("Channel\tValue\tVoltage\n\r");
00119                 for(i=0; i<8; i++)
00120                 {
00121                                 adc_sel_channel(i);
00122                                 val = read_adc();
00123                                 snprintf(buf, BUFLEN, "%d\t%u\t%f V\n\r", i, val, (double)((val*5)/1024) );
00124                                 uart_puts(buf);
00125                 }
00126                 uart_puts_P("\n\r---------Motor PWM------------\n\r");
00127                 snprintf(buf, BUFLEN, "Motor Frequency: %ld Hz\n\r", (SYS_CLK/ICR1) );
00128                 uart_puts( buf );
00129                 snprintf(buf, BUFLEN, "Motor 1: %d/%d (%d %%)\tDIR %d\t\n\r", \
00130                         __motor1_duty, PWM_RESOLUTION, (__motor1_duty*100)/PWM_RESOLUTION, PORTD & (1<<6)  );
00131                 uart_puts( buf );
00132                 snprintf(buf, BUFLEN, "Motor 2: %d/%d (%d %%)\tDIR %d\n\r", \
00133                         __motor2_duty, PWM_RESOLUTION, (__motor2_duty*100)/PWM_RESOLUTION , PORTD & (1<<7) );
00134                 uart_puts( buf ); 
00135 }
